subject: Re: How to use JUnit for multi-threaded code?
msgSnippet: Pat, A tip: Test your multi-threaded code on a computer with more than one processor. Some problems with multi-threading don t show up on a single cpu

Pat,

A tip:
Test your multi-threaded code on a computer with more than one=
 
processor. Some problems with multi-threading don't show up on a 
single =
cpu computer.

Regards, Jan

rrell@...> wrote:
